title: Fastest First Freshener Goat Birth EVER Filmed!

subtasks: Prepare supplies for assisting birth (puppy pads, towels)
Monitor labor progress (checking for nose, contractions)
Ensure safe delivery space (keeping area clean)
Support mother during delivery (allowing natural process unless complications)
Facilitate first nursing (coaxing mother to nurse, assisting if needed)
Check nursing progress and overall health of mother and newborns

tasks.task: Feed and care for newborn goats
subtasks: Ensure post-birth nutrition (providing grain and milk replacer)
Monitor mother's milk expression (assuring sufficient milk supply)
Manage multiple offspring (soothing and keeping them separated if necessary)
Maintain cleanliness (cleaning areas where newborns feed)

tasks.task: Manage older goats during birthing assistance
subtasks: Observe senior goats' assistance (Ruby helping during birth)
Ensure retired goats do not interfere (gently directing Ruby if needed)
Assess mother's and older goats' well-being (checking health and comfort)
